Welcome to LoboSec

The University of New Mexico's Capture The Flag (CTF) Cybersecurity Team

Join the Pack

Who We Are

LoboSec is a student-led cybersecurity team based at UNM. We compete in national and international CTFs and aim to grow practical skills in reverse engineering, web exploitation, cryptography, and more.
